Clean, clinically tested skincare from the sea. Founded in 1996 in Malibu, California, OSEA set a new industry standard for clean beauty, creating safe and effective seaweed-infused skincare with a holistic approach to wellness and self-care. Our formulas are powered by a unique blend of pure, potent seaweed and active botanicals for results you can sea. Mother and daughter founded, OSEA is rooted in over 100 years of multigenerational female wisdom and our family?s unwavering belief in the healing power of the sea.

F1539-N66. About the designer: The Row was established in 2006 by industry icons Ashley Olsen and Mary-Kate Olsen. Named in reverence of London's Savile Row, the fashion house emulates the bespoke standards of exceptional fabrics, impeccable details, and precise tailoring. The Row combines a timeless perspective with subtle attitudes which form an irreverent classic signature. The Row’s collections also explore the strength of simplistic shapes that speak to discretion and are based on uncompromising quality.

products.name: Shoulder Bag Chelsea, , - Black
products.brandedName: Kurt Geiger Shoulder Bag Chelsea, , - Black
products.description: The CHELSEA shoulder bag by KURT GEIGER epitomizes luxury and elegance. This small, compact bag with a classic, rounded flap design is the perfect choice for both everyday use and special occasions. Made from snake-print material, the bag dazzles with a shiny finish that adds sparkle and chic. The dominant black color gives it a timeless character, while the gold details, such as the decorative round clasp with an ornament and the sturdy, thick chains, emphasize its uniqueness. The interior of the bag, finished with a black lining, features a compartment with a slip pocket and three partitions, one of which is secured with a gold zipper, ensuring the safety of stored items. The embossed THE CHELSEA logo adds extra charm to the interior of the bag, and a small metal plate with the designer's embossed logo is located at the back. WHY SHOULD YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT? * Exclusive, luxurious look thanks to the snake-print material. * Elegant gold details adding class and sophistication. * Practical interior with multiple compartments providing organization and security. * Unique design by the renowned brand KURT GEIGER. * Perfect for elegant styling on any occasion.
